Name: Fate Worse Than Death
Effects: Gain this card and the PriorityTargetIcon Priority Target token (even if someone has the Marked for Death Trauma card). While you have this card, you cannot lose this token. End of Battle: If your Titan is dead, resolve the Fate Worse Than Death Special Event.

Name: Argo Will Suffer
Effects: Immediately gain +1 ArgoFateIcon and lose -1 CrewIcon.

Name: Another's Thread
Effects: Another random Titan gains +3 RageIcon, +3 DangerIcon, +3 FateIcon, and suffers Knockdown.

Name: Fated Memory
Effects: Immediately gain a Fated Mnemos card. If you already have 2 Fated Mnemos cards, lose all nodes from a random Fated Mnemos instead.

Name: Hadeosis
Effects: Reduce your FateIcon to 0. After Battle, resolve the Fateful Visitant Special Event.

Name: Fated To Die
Effects: Spawn the Adversary. If it is already on the Voyage Map, instead resolve 2 AdversaryIcon.

Name: Preordained Awakening
Effects: You may gain +1 ArgoFateIcon to Awaken. If you do, AdversaryIcon.

Name: Defiant Awakening
Effects: You may gain +1 ArgoFateIcon to Awaken. If you do, AdversaryIcon. Reduce your FateIcon to 0.
